amendment.description: Amendment sought to reduce the account for Agricultural Marketing Services by $7,750,000 and to apply the savings to the spending reduction account.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 9 printed in the Congressional Record to reduce the account for Agricultural Marketing Services by $7,750,000 (10 percent) and to apply the savings to the spending reduction account.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Broun (GA) amendment (A015) Failed by recorded vote: 107 - 318 (Roll no. 427).
